website_summaries.verdict: For a more modern look, this four-shelf bookcase is a great option that looks great.
pros: Three of the four shelves rotate individually so you can position your shelves how you like with this wood composite bookcase
Assembly is easy, and the finished product looks nice
cons: The shelves are only 8-inches tall, so this bookcase is best for small paperbacks and mass-market books

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: How do you purchase this after reading the reviews. I do not think this is easy to assemble. I had help assembling this but it still took a long time. It was hard to manipulate the screwdriver inside the box which you have to do. For the most part the screws lined with the holes but the plastic feet screwing them into those holes was really hard and I don’t think the holes were large enough it created a big mess. The cube stack but they don’t lock into place at all so it is wobbly. I will put this near the TV because I’m afraid it could fall into it in Cause some real damage .
customer_reviews.author: Polka loves Polka Dancing

customer_reviews.title: Its good.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is great for storing blue ray and games, I only wish the back insert (or middle in this case since you can add discs on both sides) was the same color as the unit. Instead the divider is white and it looks a bit odd. You can't notice it much if you filled the entire shelf with discs but I think most people would add accent items in addition to their disc collection and the white backing will show. I like the size, not too tall nor too small, just right to sit next to the TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: MG Household

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and unique
customer_reviews.text: I like that each cube has a separator that effectively doubles the storage potential. Also, I can hide away things on the back. Smart design, each cube can be rotated separately. We like that the spaces can be angled in many creative ways. It is shorter than I hoped. I'd prefer 4 tiers. It is only about 30 inches height. So, I put mine on an end table. This is MDF (particle board) so, it could age and bloat with humidity and spills.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: set aside some time to assembled
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome space saving storage for movies. the product is good for what it does best to store your movies. it turns and all the parts came inside the box. just set aside some time to assembled and don't rush the assembled process. it wont look like anything until the end product. then voila!, you will see how its magical to look at the finished work. good luck! and i would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Okay but the spinning isn't smooth
customer_reviews.text: The design seems okay but the spinning doesn't go so smoothly. As it gets movies or items on the shelf the harder it gets to spin. It is circles cut out with plastic pieces in each cube to help it spin. When you lift it it comes right apart. It holds a reasonable amount of dvds, about 18-19 per shelf per side for an approximate total of 144 movies depending how fat the boxes are. It would probably hold more blue rays because they are slim lined and all ones size. It doesn't take up too much space and fits in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby P.

customer_reviews.title: Best suited for hard flooring
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed reviews on this item. The design is very modern which I do like however set up was a bit challenging and the unit is not as sturdy as I felt it would be. It works well for our intended purpose but might not work well for heavier items. Also sits better on hard floors. Setting it on carpet makes the shelf much less stable. Shipping was quick and packaging held up well during transport.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyHoff

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cabinet. I was worried about the expresso color, but it is almost black which is what I wanted. It was pretty easy to build. It isn’t super smooth to spin the shelves around, but it does work. Compared to alternatives I could find for sale, I am really happy with this and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but it might break at some point
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Assembly was early easy once you know what you're doing. However I didn't know the cube would be divided and you won't see the back until you rotate it. It looks nice but it seems like the plastic things that make it rotate will not last long. I don't plan to rotate it that often but still.
customer_reviews.author: Marce

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to my study/workshop. Easy assemble and each cubby is removable for portability, to me. Some may dislike it but how else can it rotate, right? I love the idea of a rotating shelf because now I don't have to worry about the order of putting my junk in a deep shelf. Since I have shot glasses on one side, I may do some diy and add some protective see through plastic as a window to prevent any fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Rikku

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching shelf
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these. It was challenging to put together but worth it. The sections do rotate. If you are looking for a speedy rotation...then you will not get it here. It is secure. It does function as the item suggest. Would have loved for it to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA WALL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  turn well but looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Great DVD storage rack that doesn't look like your run of the mill trash rack. But it doesn't turn well. You can just have it look like a shelf. You dont have to set it crooked. We love ours. If you have kids, just set their movies on the front side because this doesn't like to turn. With they sold it with a remote control that spins it for you and small lights on top for finding movies faster.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepen

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of movies
customer_reviews.text: I did have a terrible time assembling this but I am not good at assembling kits. This one was a little difficult but once it's finished it is really nice. It holds a lot of movies in a small space and that is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: gingin

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with this product! Shipping was fast, and It arrived 1 day earlier than expected. Assembling it was very easy, and I finished it in less than 2 hours. On an average person its comes to alittle bit above the waist, so its taller than i expected. All parts rotate very smoothly, and its very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: very functional , but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, they store the CDs well. For the money, they can't be beat. They are a little hard to rotate, the whole tower wants to turn. But the pieces fit together fine, and it looks like most of the "fake wood" items being sold today.
customer_reviews.author: bergy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bit of storage.  Love the rotating sections to allow for storage back and front.
customer_reviews.text: Great storage. Easy to put together. Was short one of the little dots to keep the pieces turning correctly. Literally a dot I could have gotten in any store buy I still contacted the manufacturer. They had a whole package of these little dots out to me immediately. Great service, wonderful product. Cannot recommend highly enough for a little extra storage to keep things neat in the family room. Storage in front and back of the blocks so much more than it looks in the picture. We are really enjoying this tower.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Its super cute, I love it so much.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is double sided for more space so instead of having 4 openings, it has 8. I am able to place my most watched movies in the front. It's spins well and I get so many compliments on it. It is super cute
customer_reviews.author: kairi

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the cost here at Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I have some collectables like odd energy drinks on both sides of the rotating shelf. Wish it had black separating panels instead of the white you see. Setup took me an hour. I actual have the shelf boxes upside down that's why you see the screw holes, just gotta flip them over easy fix. The box like shelf rotates on plastic stubs. The lighter the item you put in the easier it rotates. Wish this was on a rotating bearing setup. Cheapest price is here Amazon you will see various prices on other sites to be very high.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Albaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, bad design and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, bad design and quality. Assembly impossible. After purchasing two other products from this company which we found to be of high quality and design, this was a total disappointment. In spite of many poor ratings on the Amazon site we decided to buy the Atlantic 4 Tier Cube based on the previous satisfaction we had with their products. Big Mistake. It was impossible to construct even the first cube. The screw and lock system didn't work and it was impossible to attach the sides to the base. Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Leach

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Rotates smoothly. Would rate 5 stars had the partitions been the same color of the cube. Totally do not understand white. Covered the partitions with black adhesive cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Super low height wise even for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for a toddler, not worth the price... Super low height wise even for my 9 year old. Lots of patience required and if you want a good rotation screw screws all the way down....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't spin very easily, but they look cool.
customer_reviews.text: They definitely look unique, and hold a ton of titles. Just be aware that they don't spin very freely. They stack on top of each other with a small plastic joint piece between each cube, so the friction causes the whole tower to spin if you don't hold the other cubes in place. If you don't plan on moving them much (which we don't), then it shouldn't bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: They rotate with ease and hold all my games and movies. Looks nice and is pretty sturdy. The cubes can be pulled off pretty easily, if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: cyko79

customer_reviews.title: I Like it.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of storage for my DVD's. The only thing that could improve is smoother rotation of the sections, maybe on a bearing mount, the more you load, the harder to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, holds a lot of games
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. Not all the hardware was in the original package, but they sent replacements quickly enough. Stores a respectable amount of games, but not meant for much else. Rotation is okay, but not on bearings, just a round turret. Each level sits on top of the others and is not connected physically, so it comes apart quickly. It looks great and does what it's supposed to do, but the quality of the construction didn't really warrant the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money!!! Don't waste your time at all... it's not the big size it's very small...like tiny for $70... no way
customer_reviews.author: Candii

customer_reviews.title: Is good. Only take 30mins to Put on
customer_reviews.text: Is good . Only take 30mins to Put on. And it looks good . Just little bit too short .
customer_reviews.author: Peng Wang

customer_reviews.title: corner stand
customer_reviews.text: I love it...I don't have something that's huge and wide ...I love the part I can move the box and also hide
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shelf for games.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool case for my PS4/Xboxone/Wii U games. It isn't sturdy, so if you're looking for something that won't tip over easily, this isn't the shelf for you. I am able to swivel each compartment fairly easily, and even store my game controllers in them. It looks really cool and set up was fairly easy. Like everyone else said, there will be a lot of styrofoam particles upon opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: Okay so my husband and I assembled this item and it looks exactly as shown. It’s is super easy to put together. The only little things I’d say is that for some reason two of the corners of the boxes are getting scratch by the box on top, so we are being really careful turning it. But over all, great peace for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage tower. Took about 45 minutes to put together but it was simple. Looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Levy

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are useless. I figured out how to put this cube together on my own. The pieces were wrapped in a lot of styrafoam that got all over the floor. Despite that, the finished product is okay for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Rashell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, fits nicely in my living room. Overall a lovely item.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely item to my living room. Not exactly what I wanted but it's cool.
customer_reviews.author: G A

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Needed more storage for blu-rays and ps4 games, and this is working out well. It was kind of a pain to put together, came with a few superficial imperfections, and only rotates in a sluggish fashion, but I like it quite a bit. I would buy another one, if I need more space in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Fan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool item. Assembled in 5-10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. Assembled in like 10 minutes. No issues. Smaller than we imagined but that's not their fault. Only issue is I wish there was something to hold the boxes together once assembled, they just sit on a round spinner one on top of the other,so they could potentially come off. Not a flaw just a thought. Definitely for light items only.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestRegJoe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for me considering im building a blue ray collection
customer_reviews.author: chrbn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Looks great and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Holtzman

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the area it requires to keep rotating the cubes. A great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Urbano

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot smaller than they made it look. I could have found a bigger one for a much better deal! It's not big enough for all the items I was putting on it! I'm really disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  Miller

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice piece of furniture which does hold many dvd's
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice piece of furniture which does hold many dvd's. The only thing is that I did not realize there was storage on the other side. So when you turn the sections, sometime they all move.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Matches my other espresso colored home theater furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shelves
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shelves. They're (of course) easy to put together. They spin nicely without being so loose to where you feel like they're going to fly off. Great space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Corri

customer_reviews.title: maybe sand it down so it does not ruin the bottom plate
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part if you move it, it scrapes and ruins the bottom plate so that is my only dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Tsaknis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, relatively easy to assemble. Easy way to organize and quickly locate cds & dvds. Got a pair. Oveall great purchase. Could be cheaper though, chinese made product.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Will probably buy another
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and its a nice size for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AlexTheGreat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece has a lot of space and looks awesome for a few collectibles, only problem is some screw holes wouldn’t be punched in i even thought there was no holes but i double checked and all i had to do was push them in. But regardless it’s awesome and has a lot of space for video games and dvds👌🏼.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product for its use
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job holding an abundance of Blu ray discs. I do however wish the divider was a darker color so it didn’t “stick out” as much.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A cool looking piece
customer_reviews.text: A cool looking piece, but the corners were a little dinged when I got it and the spin is not well designed. Each cube sits on a small plastic hat, and it holds all of the weight of everything above it. It could be better, but for the price, its good.
customer_reviews.author: mugawup

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I was expecting, great find!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little DVDs towers. So far my husband and I have reordered three times to fit extra stuff, and in case we can't find this same product in the future. The only downside is the white background, which means you have to completely fill each cube if you don't want that showing.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great Modern-Looking Media Storage
customer_reviews.text: This holds all of our DVDs and Blu-Rays, was very easy to assemble, and looks great in our entertainment room! We are trying to go for a modern look in our room, and this media storage unit fits that theme perfectly without taking up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie A. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good way to keep stuff organized. It was actually the perfect size for regular books and dvd and game cases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rotating Cubes
customer_reviews.text: This item held 272 DVDs for me and was easy to put together. Would be nice if they had an even taller one.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great design, except one problem
customer_reviews.text: Great design, except one problem, turning the unit can be a hastle, I'd suggest putting a microwave type turn table system in between to support the weight. Other than that it's an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this shelf, however do not expect to be able to move it easily as the cubes only stack on top of one another. Wish it was a bit more sturdy in that aspect, but it's very aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Missi Barry

customer_reviews.title: All smiles
customer_reviews.text: Ours is in our bedroom. It's so great when your laying on your bed and you just spin it around to review what you have...no stooping over back ache!
customer_reviews.author: Anna A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: It is okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like putting a puzzle together and okay quality. Has a part missing so I called mfg. Great customer service and prompt delivery of missing part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 120 DVDs sure seemed like a lot...
customer_reviews.text: You'll be using it for the favorites and storing the rest somewhere else. I added casters for mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Martino

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pivots, crooked when half full
customer_reviews.text: The bottom will not pivot due to the weight of the upper cubes with media. The pivots are just plastic disks. If you fill one side the box will notably be crooked from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: jomamafool

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not good, the paint on two sides is peeling off and I received it today!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner then expected which is always awesome! And easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer3355

customer_reviews.title: Not stable
customer_reviews.text: Wobbles too much.. yes I put it all together correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rey

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It’s very easy to assemble and it looks great once completed! Customer service was great!
customer_reviews.author: michael roseberry

customer_reviews.title: Extremely heavy and must assemble
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy and have to put together. Didn't realize how difficult that would be when I ordered it so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and adds a nice touch with the swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Item, just wish it was a tad bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: RonnieJohn

customer_reviews.title: how good it looks
customer_reviews.text: This product was used for my DVD,s and looks great, and so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: peter allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my sons collection of cds, dvds etc. Went together without a problem, looks pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for small paperback books. Books were too heavy for it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my Dvds look like a piece of artwork. Really adds to my room
customer_reviews.author: Debra Yharbrough

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product, great for multiple decors
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, packaged well, fantastic product, great for multiple decors, sturdy and cubistic styling!
customer_reviews.author: Bahama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think the picture is misleading, it's smaller than it looks and it is over priced in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley and Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much, bought another. Great way to store media & save space. Easy assembly. Great seller & item.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Ardis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, does exactly what it said it would do. Great product for the price. Not for someone who wants high quality/real wood. This is artificial but it does look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: HuskerKara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this - nice quality, arrived on time...great buy
customer_reviews.author: Aeonfluxx75

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. A little smaller than expected. Turns without resistance. Only gripe... the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Sowers

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble and looks great! The only issue I had was the styro foam packing material came out of the box shredded. I spent more time cleaning it up than I dd assembling the unit.
customer_reviews.author: GeriatricX

customer_reviews.title: decent vaule for the money
customer_reviews.text: not the most difficult to put togeter looks nice very convient for little things. Not the most sturdiest thing but a decient value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Huffaker

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to build but after using it for a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to build but after using it for a bit now groves have been dug into the bottom from just normal amount of turning the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Mica Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Thought of using it like a bookshelf but it is too small to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought of using it like a bookshelf but it is too small to hold even the medium sized notebooks. Not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get your vacuum claner ready
customer_reviews.text: This storage tower does exactly what I need. Assembly is fairly straightforward. Once everything is put together and DVD/Blu Ray media is put into the cubes, the entire assembly is reasonably stable. You can rotate the cubes but they won't really rotate "individually", since the cubes are on top of each other. But this is no big deal for me as I just set them to the position I prefer and start putting media into them. One rather annoying down side is with the packaging. There will be styrofoam pieces all over the place so make sure you have a vacuum cleaner ready.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this it's perfect for CDs and DVDs
customer_reviews.text: I love this it's perfect for CDs and DVDs. I thought that the cubes were enclosed but they are not. However it's still a great product
customer_reviews.author: Michele Chasse

customer_reviews.title: verify dimensions prior to buying
customer_reviews.text: Piece was smaller than what was stated when I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Jmg

customer_reviews.title: best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I bpught! It spins great! Love love love it!! Small. Holds everything!! Fabulous product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Aweful.... poor quality... should be sold for 10.00... wish I didnt pay some to install this, i would have sent it right back...... Not worth it dont buy
customer_reviews.author: msflorida

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I just got done puttin one, of the two I got, together. It looks amazing! Perfect product
customer_reviews.author: PuddinCups

customer_reviews.title: I use it to hold my DVDs and love how it looks in the family room
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hold my DVDs and love how it looks in the family room. It's nicer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aidsha V.

customer_reviews.title: I love this piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. Makes my movie collection look supper cool. It was easy to put together. My husband didn't have any difficulty to fallow the directions. Totally buy this if you looking for funky furniture. We love it ❤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tough to build but works well. Instruction are what you expect from flat pack
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: great product easy to make
customer_reviews.text: this product came well packaged, very easy directions and set up. my only complaint is that the wall panels inside each cube is white not the color of the cubes themselves. so it makes it stand out a bit glaring. the picture makes it look like the divider walls are the same color as the unit but they are not. they are very white.
customer_reviews.author: ann hardaway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easily viewable storage for DVDs. A little extra effort to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: VTstargazer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise cubes are awesome.. I will buy another
customer_reviews.text: Cubs are not attached to each other ... So be aware when you try and move it. Otherwise cubes are awesome .. I will buy another .
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Swift

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cube
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, perfect fit for my small space. Lots of room and easy access for my DVDs, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Favorite piece of furniture in my house
customer_reviews.text: Favorite piece of furniture in my house!! Very easy to put together and works great for so many different things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cubes easy to build. Little tight to turn cubes but still love it
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: This CD Rack is really good! fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This CD Rack is really good! fits perfectly. You can turn the segmented area and design it however you want.
customer_reviews.author: Yura Rusin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, holds 100+ DVDs with 2 pictures. Great buy! Shipped fast!
customer_reviews.author: Noodle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, solid construction. Like it so much, I ordered two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when put together it was just fine.
customer_reviews.text: looked in the picture that it was taller. when put together it was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN COLBY

customer_reviews.title: small but nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice but a lot smaller the I thought it would be. I did not put the dividers in.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... bigger than what it actually is and I dont like that the squares are not stable
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger than what it actually is and I dont like that the squares are not stable. I like that they can turn but you can easly take the squares apart or if it so happen to fall over they would come detatched from one another.
customer_reviews.author: Adonica

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but me thinks me have too get me another one. Too many movies.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Atlantic 4 Tier Rotating Cube Espresso
product_meta.description: Sometimes you need your storage solutions to be “off the wall. ” this striking media tower is composed of four stacked cubes, The upper three of which can rotate 360 degrees. Each cube has space equivalent to two compartments for CDs, DVDs, or games, and a nearly endless configuration of ways to reach them.
feature_bullets: Capacity: 216 CDs, 144 DVDs, or 168 blue-rays or games
1 fixed and 3 rotating cubes with over 10” of clearance each
Space equivalent to 2 compartments per Cube
Steel-rod cross bar supports for added support and stability

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
